name: FEEL the WOODS
description:
NOTE: Everything in this game was entirely made by ....me lol

In this puzzle-solving game "FEEL the WOODS" you play as a character who can't find his friends and will have to wander through the forest to find clues about them, however, due to the lack of light you will have to find other ways to move around and make risky decisions, like rolling dice between life or death...

CONTROLS AND ADVICE

WASD to move

headphones are highly recommended but not necessary
